title: "Microsoft announces auto-generated captions for images in Edge"
excerpt: "Microsoft uses Azure Cognitive Services to analyze and describe pictures with missing \"alt text.\" When Edge detects an unlabeled image, it sends it to Microsoft's servers for processing."
